title: MySQLDROP TABLEStatement

metadata.description: Learn about MySQLDROP TABLEStatement with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
The MySQL DROP TABLE Statement
The
DROP TABLE
statement is used to drop an existing table in a database.
Syntax
DROP TABLE
table_name
;
Note
:
Be careful before dropping a table. Deleting a 
table will result in loss of complete information stored in the table!
MySQL DROP TABLE Example
The following SQL statement drops the existing table "Shippers":
Example
DROP TABLE Shippers;
MySQL TRUNCATE TABLE
The
TRUNCATE TABLE
statement is used to delete the data inside a table, but 
not the table itself.
Syntax
TRUNCATE TABLE
table_name
;

★
+1

quiz.question:
What is MySQL
DROP TABLE
Statement

The MySQL DROP TABLE Statement
The
DROP TABLE
statement?
options: used to delete the data inside a table
used to drop an existing table in a database
quiz.explanation:
The correct definition of MySQL
DROP TABLE
Statement

The MySQL DROP TABLE Statement
The
DROP TABLE
statement is 'used to drop an existing table in a database'.

quiz.question:
What is MySQL TRUNCATE TABLE
The
TRUNCATE TABLE
statement?
options: used to delete the data inside a table
used to drop an existing table in a database
quiz.explanation:
The correct definition of MySQL TRUNCATE TABLE
The
TRUNCATE TABLE
statement is 'used to delete the data inside a table'.
